title: Which one is better, the Redmi Note 9 or the Realme 7i? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definitely, Redmi note 9 because it has more RAM, more storage capacity, better SOC. Redmi note 9 chipset is Mediatek Helio P85 and the antutu score is 206,311. On the other hand, the Realme 7i chipset is Qualcomm Snapdragon 662. The antutu score is 141324. Thus, you can see the difference. Apart from that, the Geekbench score of Helio G85 is high than Snapdragon 662. This result is enough to show you which phone is better. Go for Redmi note 9.
Redmi note 9 better than realme 7i like battery performance, fast charging, pixel density for picture quality etc. But if u want 64 mp camera & latest phone than go for realmi 7i
